model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Co-workers B, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Co-workers A: I just gave my boss the written report. I hope she finds it helpful.
Co-workers B: Did you make sure to include all the necessary details?
Co-workers A: Yes, I made sure to cover everything we talked about in the meeting. I even added some extra information that I thought could be useful.
Co-workers B: That's smart thinking. It shows that you're invested in the company and want to make sure things run smoothly.
Co-workers A: Thanks. I learned a lot from taking over the family business. It taught me the importance of being efficient and proactive.
Co-workers B: I remember you telling me about that. It's amazing how much you've accomplished since then.
Co-workers A: It's been a journey, but I'm glad to see the business flourishing. It gives me a sense of pride and accomplishment.
Co-workers B: I can tell. You're always trying to find ways to improve things.
Co-workers A: Exactly. That's why I felt a written report would be the best way to communicate the information to my boss. It saves time and ensures everything is organized.
Co-workers B: Makes sense. I'm sure your boss will appreciate your efforts.
Co-workers A: I hope so. I just want to make sure we're all on the same page and working towards our goals.

[MEMORY]
1. Co-worker A took over the family business and made changes to adapt to modern times, leading to the business flourishing recently.
2. Co-worker A's father was hesitant to hand over the business but now trusts Co-worker A, resulting in the family business doing well recently.
3. Co-worker A gave Co-worker B a pen as a thoughtful gesture, which symbolizes trust in their professional relationship and is still being used.

memory_text:
1. Co-worker A took over the family business and made changes to adapt to modern times, leading to the business flourishing recently.
2. Co-worker A's father was hesitant to hand over the business but now trusts Co-worker A, resulting in the family business doing well recently.
3. Co-worker A gave Co-worker B a pen as a thoughtful gesture, which symbolizes trust in their professional relationship and is still being used.
speaker: Co-workers B
raw_prediction: I'm sure your boss will recognize your dedication and hard work. Your attention to detail and proactive approach will definitely pay off.
prediction:
Brief explanation: The dialogue context revolves around Co-worker A's way of working and how they applied what they learned from managing their family business to their current job. In the memory, information about Co-worker A's experience in managing family business and how they made it flourish is present, which has relevance to the context.
Judgement: "Yes"
